pullRequest.title: feat(sample): Add pnp TemperatureController (2 component) sample

nodes.bodyText: For what its worth, the SDK will assign a message id for you if you don't explicitly set one like this
I would rather call this Component1
call it Property to update? or add a comment?

commit.message: feat(sample): Add plug and play TemperatureController sample (component)

afterCommit.message: feat(sample): Add plug and play TemperatureController sample (component)

nodes.bodyText: Looks like we are adding this file to our own repo as well. So why not point it to our version of it? This repo is not owned by us and it can change so it might be safer to point to our own. Or we don't have a copy on our end so that there is no multi master problem
